title: Book of the Sethian
description: Angels. Demons. Ancient prophecies. For seventeen year old Emma Boyd, they’re nothing more than fantastic bible stories. Until she meets the enigmatic and slightly grouchy Pitch and finds herself pulled into his world of mystery and danger. With the help of a few friends, the two of them must learn to trust and rely on each other if they’re going to survive Lords of the underworld, divine intervention, and millennia of family drama. Will their bond be strong enough?
author: Kay  Herrmann
